column3: “Very easily a 4 but not quite a 5 for me. This is a very nice sativa-ish strain. Makes me talkative. Very calming and yet your mind stays active and you are focused. No paranoia but I do feel speedy... like I drank a little too much coffee... but without any of the nervousness. It's a mental and physical stimulant. I think I could do some officework while on this. Probably a good strain for writers 'cause your mind s...”
“excellent i like taste an smells good.”"
“pungent citrus flower. gets the creative juices flowing without the paranoia.”
“My favorite!  Doesn't make you paranoid, very euphoric and happy.”

“I like this strain. It's a good slightly sativa dominant hybrid for the morning and early afternoon. The flavor is very lemony with a hint of lavender and hops (linalol and myrcene). It's not my favorite, by far, but I'll definitely enjoy it if it's available.”
“One of my favorite strains. Great day time high”
“zippy, beautiful smoke that tastes like thin mint cookies in the nose”
“Minty and earthy flavor. Gives you an energetic feeling right away! The bud is airy and smells delicious. Highly recommended  :)”

“I thought this was more chilled and laid back than what it was advertising to be. I definitely didn't feel energetic or uplifted. I wanted to sleep and relax more than anything. It has a great taste and smooth, just not very sativafied.”

“A Hybrid choice for Seattle CannaCon 2019! By Sensimilla, Buddha's Hand is a day-time hybrid and also a God bud being the God of Wisdom along with a very similar high as Laughing Buddha. If you don't have Jesus OG or Laughing Buddha, try this one!”
“This is a great strain with a beautiful stone. Buddha's Hand has a wonderful smell and aftertaste.”
“i am absolutely loving this dank lush man  may be one of the best ive ever had”
